text: Colin Lewis (11 June 1882 - December 1962) was a British swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1962 deaths Category:British male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Great Britain Category:Swimmers at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Chalford
title: Colin Lewis (swimmer)
